<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Overwhelming Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1730) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 127 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You throw your weight into a powerful attack that leaves you vulnerable. Make a melee Strike. This counts as three attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you get a critical hit. If you roll a critical hit, your attack also gains the [deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) trait. Whether or not you hit, you become [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) and are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of your next turn.
name: Overwhelming Blow
